title: Identity
description: Identity is used to clearly distinguish people that are interacting with digital experiences. Identity is established by an identity provider, which itself is referenced in the `namespace` attribute. Within each `namespace`, the identity is unique.

xdm:namespace.title: Namespace
xdm:namespace.description: The namespace associated with the `xid` attribute and matched up with the AAM data source integration code.

xdm:xid.title: Experience identifier
xdm:xid.description: When present, experience identifier value represents a cross-namespace identifier that is unique across all namespace-scoped identifiers in all namespaces.
